title: 4.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create a table in Microsoft Word. Enter the details of some of your friends as shown below.

1. Apply suitable table styles and enhance the table design using table properties.
2. Sort the data in an alphabetical order with respect to the Name column.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
